long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
K.c Smart Auto Booker (Lite Version) - Amazon Relay Load Board Auto Booker & Refresher

K.c Smart Auto Booker automates the Load Booking process on Amazon Relay Load Board, increasing your company’s profitability by booking the highest rate loads.
Allowing you to focus on the work that matters with a set of designated additional filters to boost your productivity.

The extension will provide you with features that will help you Auto Book the optimal loads & loads that you have previously missed from Amazon Relay Load Board. 

[_̅_̅☆̲̅⭐̲̅★̲̅   WHAT'S NEW ★̲̅⭐̲̅☆̲̅_̅_̅]
`````````````````````````````````````````````````
☑️ NEW FEBRUARY UPDATE (2024).
☑️ WORKS WITH NEW RELAY LOADBOARD UPDATE (FEBRUARY - 2024).
☑️ NOW WORKS FASTER & MORE STABLE.

[_̅_̅☆̲̅ 🔍★̲̅   FEATURES ★̲̅ 🔎☆̲̅_̅_̅]
```````````````````````````````````````````````
✅ Refresh Rate : Auto-Refresh Load Board with fully adjustable refresh rate speeds with all new randomizer feature.
✅ New Load Alert : Get notifications audibly and visually when new load become available.
✅ Price Change Alert :  Get notifications audibly and visually when the price of a Load changes.
✅ Fast Book : Allow you to book loads with just one click.
✅ Locations Filter : Where you can Include or exclude required locations. 
✅ Auto Book : Automatically book loads in a lightening speed.
✅ User Interface : Very modern and Simple to use Interface.
✅ Notifications : Haptic feedback vibration on button press and during notifications.
✅ Works with Amazon Globally : US, EU, UK, IN and CA .
✅ The Lite Version works on both PC and Android OS (Via Kiwi Browser)
✅ Safe Mode : Hides all the filters and unnecessary elements so you can focus on the loads without any distractions.
✅ Regular Updates : We regularly update our extension software by adding new features and improvement to make your work easier.
````````````````````````````````````````````````````
